Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP now for a few weeks after finding it on Steam. Have quite enjoyed it and am looking forward to attempting community challenges while waiting for the campaign mode to be finished!
Have fun and Welcome on the Forums:)

Welcome to the forums! Is there an echo in here?

Feel free to look around and jump right into a conversation if it interests you. We also have a great "How-To" section full of people who will try to answer any questions you have about building, launching, and flying your craft. I also try to maintain a little library in my signature that has all sorts of useful information like tutorials, graphs, and other such things.

Happy landings!

Thanks all for the welcome. I've been reading a lot of helpful tutorials and look forward to contributing to the community as I can.

~D
